classroom.name: product-container
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; margin-inline: auto; max-width: 1110px;

classroom.name: hero-container
classroom.style: align-items: center; display: flex; gap: 24px; justify-content: space-between;

classroom.name: hero-div
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; max-width: 445px; width: 100%;

classroom.name: hero-section
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 32px; margin-top: 16px;

classroom.name: hero-title
classroom.style: color: black; font-size: 40px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 1.43px; line-height: 44px;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-cart-button
classroom.style: align-items: center; background-color: #D87D4A; border: none; color: white; cursor: pointer; display: flex; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; justify-content: center; letter-spacing: 1px; min-height: 48px; transition: 150ms; width: 160px;

classroom.name: additional-container
classroom.style: display: flex; gap: 120px; justify-content: space-between; margin-top: 160px;

classroom.name: additional-features
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; max-width: 635px; width: 100%;

classroom.name: p-description
classroom.style: color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); font-size: 15px; font-weight: 500; line-height: 25px; margin-top: 32px; white-space: pre-line;

classroom.name: additional-box

mediaQueries.style: display: grid; flex-direction: row; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; max-width: 100%;

classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 32px; max-width: 350px; width: 100%;

classroom.name: additional-box-ul
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 8px; list-style: none; margin: 0; padding: 0;

classroom.name: gallery-container
classroom.style: display: grid; gap: 32px 30px; grid-template: 'i1 i3' 'i2 i3'; justify-content: center; margin-top: 160px; max-width: 1110px; width: 100%;

classroom.name: like-container
classroom.style: align-items: center; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 64px; margin-top: 160px; max-width: 1110px; width: 100%;

classroom.name: like-container > ul:nth-of-type(1)
classroom.style: align-items: center; display: flex; gap: 24px; justify-content: space-between; list-style: none; margin-inline: auto; max-width: 1110px; padding: 0; width: 100%;

classroom.name: like-container > ul:nth-of-type(1) > li
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 40px; max-width: 350px; width: 100%;

classroom.name: like-container > ul:nth-of-type(1) > li > section
classroom.style: align-items: center; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 32px;

children.style: color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); font-size: 15px; font-weight: 500; line-height: 25px; margin-block: 79px 56px; transition: 150ms;
